body:
This PR involves no functional changes, just a couple typo fixes and additional comments on ignored warning/error codes.

All warning/error code definitions come from one of:

- flake8: http://flake8.pycqa.org/en/latest/user/error-codes.html
- pycodestyle: https://pycodestyle.readthedocs.io/en/latest/intro.html#error-codes
- pep8-naming: https://pypi.org/project/pep8-naming/
title: Typo fixes in .flake8 comments
